description: For the low price of some /b/Lua/b/ /6/coding skills/6/, you can use Computers to /6/program nearly any system/6/ you can think of. /b/Automated logistics? Secure storefronts? Detailed informative displays? The internet?/b/ It's all possible, with a little coding.

/b/Computers/b/ will /6/connect to adjacent peripherals/6/ to /6/pass data/6/ between them. peripherals include special blocks like Monitors, Printers, and Disk Drives, but also other blocks you can get information from, like Containers, Redstone components, Energy storage, and more.
<text>Visit the online wiki for more information on APIs and programming <dark_aqua><underline><link href="https://tweaked.cc">here</link></underline></dark_aqua></text>
